title: Projects
text:
📅 Date: 12/21

Processed player_stats.csv dataset containing ATP rankings of 500 tennis players.

Filtered and cleaned data, focusing on Best Rank, Prize Money, and Plays; removed null values.

Analyzed correlation between Best Rank and Prize Money using visualizations and statistical techniques.

Applied K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) regression algorithm for ranking predictions.

Summarized data insights by calculating mean, max, and min prize money per ranking group.

title: Projects
section: 🧠 Machine Learning Techniques for Predicting Stroke (Final Project)
text:
🧠 Machine Learning Techniques for Predicting Stroke (Final Project)
📅 Date: 01/23 – 04/23

Conducted exploratory data analysis and visualization using Python to identify stroke-related risk factors.

Implemented multiple machine learning models, optimizing performance using ROC/AUC analysis.

Identified Multinomial Logistic Regression as the best model for unbalanced datasets using G-Mean comparison.
